name: Omnium Shield
description: Do you want to be the lead character of a movie? Do you want to stop any incoming bullets by simply raising your hand? Try out the Omnium Shield, which has a powerful barrier and stops incoming projectiles.
source: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for 10 seconds, with starting energy equal to **200%** of the Wanderer's Max HP and a 90-second cooldown.

advancement.description: Slow enemies that pass through the shield by **50%** for 2 seconds.
Reduce frost damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When Wanderers or allies pass through the Omnium Shield, damage dealt increases by **25%** for 7 seconds.
